tool_description: Help to query for skincare, makeup shopping, hybrid products, hair products, fragrance, etc... as on sephora.com
title: Sephora

api_list.name: us/products/v2/detail
api_list.description: Get details of product by id

required_parameters.name: productId
required_parameters.description: The value of productId returned in .../products/list or .../products/search endpoint

required_parameters.name: preferedSku
required_parameters.description: The value of skuId field returned in .../products/list or .../products/search endpoint

api_list.name: us/products/v2/search
api_list.description: Search products by term or phrase with options and filters

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: Any term or phrase to search for relating products

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: ref
optional_parameters.description: The value of refinementValue fields returned right in this endpoint. Pass this parameter several times for multiple filters. Ex : ...&ref=filters[Brand]=Shark Beauty&ref=filters[Brand]=ghd&...

optional_parameters.name: currentPage
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : P_BEST_SELLING:0|P_BEST_SELLING:1|P_PROD_NAME:0|P_PROD_NAME:1|P_NEW:1|P_NEW:0|P_START_DATE:1|P_START_DATE:0|P_RATING:0|P_RATING:1|P_SEPH_EXCLUSIVE:1|P_SEPH_EXCLUSIVE:0|price:1|price:00 or 1 value means asc or desc

optional_parameters.name: pl
optional_parameters.description: Filter by min price. Check \\\\\\\"price range\\\\\\\" under refinements JSON object for suitable price range.

optional_parameters.name: node
optional_parameters.description: The value of categoryId returned in .../categories/list or .../categories/list-root

optional_parameters.name: ph
optional_parameters.description: Filter by max price. Check \\\\\\\"price range\\\\\\\" under refinements JSON object for suitable price range.

api_list.name: us/products/v2/list
api_list.description: List products with options and filters

required_parameters.name: categoryId
required_parameters.description: The value of categoryId returned in .../categories/list or .../categories/list-root

optional_parameters.name: ref
optional_parameters.description: The value of refinementValue fields returned right in this endpoint. Pass this parameter several times for multiple filters. Ex : ...&ref=filters[Brand]=Shark Beauty&ref=filters[Brand]=ghd&...

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: currentPage
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description:
One of the following : P_BEST_SELLING:0|P_BEST_SELLING:1|P_PROD_NAME:0|P_PROD_NAME:1|P_NEW:1|P_NEW:0|P_START_DATE:1|P_START_DATE:0|P_RATING:0|P_RATING:1|P_SEPH_EXCLUSIVE:1|P_SEPH_EXCLUSIVE:0|price:1|price:0
0 or 1 value means asc or desc

api_list.name: reviews/list
api_list.description: List reviews relating to specific product

optional_parameters.name: RatingValue
optional_parameters.description: Filter by rating score from 1 to 5

optional_parameters.name: Offset
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: Limit
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

api_list.name: products/check-availability
api_list.description: Check availability of specific product around a location

required_parameters.name: latitude
required_parameters.description: Latitude of GEO location to search for nearest stocked stores

required_parameters.name: skuId
required_parameters.description: The value of skuId field returned in .../products/list or .../products/search endpoint

required_parameters.name: longitude
required_parameters.description: Longitude of GEO location to search for nearest stocked stores

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: The radious around the GEO location to search for stores

api_list.name: products/search-by-barcode
api_list.description: Search product by barcode (UPC)

required_parameters.name: upccode
required_parameters.description: The scanned code (UPC)

required_parameters.name: categoryId
required_parameters.description: The value of categoryId returned in .../categories/list or .../categories/list-root

optional_parameters.name: currentPage
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: ref
optional_parameters.description: The value of refinementValueId fields returned right in this endpoint. Pass this parameter several times for multiple filters. Ex : ...&ref=21972988&ref=5024296&...

optional_parameters.name: pl

optional_parameters.name: pageSize

api_list.name: categories/list
api_list.description: List categories and its recursive.

required_parameters.name: categoryId
required_parameters.description: The value of categoryId returned right in this endpoint or .../categories/list-root endpoint

api_list.name: reviews/v2/list
api_list.description: List reviews related to a product

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../products/v2/list endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : HK|AU|BN|ID|MY|NZ|PH|SG|TW|TH

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : recent|-recent

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The page index for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: native
optional_parameters.description: true - Exclude Sephora US reviews

optional_parameters.name: variants
optional_parameters.description: The value of variant -> data -> id field returned right in this endpoint. To filter reviews related to specific product variant.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: One of the following and need to be pair with country parameter properly: en-HK|zh-HK|en-AU|en-BN|id-ID|en-ID|en-MY|en-NZ|en-PH|en-SG|en-TW|zh-TW|th-TH|en-TH

api_list.name: products/v2/detail
api_list.description: Get detailed information of a product

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../products/v2/list endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : HK|AU|BN|ID|MY|NZ|PH|SG|TW|TH

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: One of the following and need to be pair with country parameter properly: en-HK|zh-HK|en-AU|en-BN|id-ID|en-ID|en-MY|en-NZ|en-PH|en-SG|en-TW|zh-TW|th-TH|en-TH

api_list.name: products/v2/list
api_list.description: List products with options and filters

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The page index for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Search product by term. Ex : bikini top

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : HK|AU|BN|ID|MY|NZ|PH|SG|TW|TH

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : relevance|sales|published_at|rating|price|-price

optional_parameters.name: brand
optional_parameters.description: The value of \\\\\\\"id\\\\\\\" field returned in .../brands/v2/list. Separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : 266,2636

optional_parameters.name: product_group
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : new-arrivals|bestsellers

optional_parameters.name: min_price
optional_parameters.description: Filter products by price

optional_parameters.name: others
optional_parameters.description: Support only value : on_sale

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The value of \\\"id\\\" field returned in .../categories/v2/list endpoint. Separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : 801,805

optional_parameters.name: max_price
optional_parameters.description: Filter products by price

optional_parameters.name: root_brand
optional_parameters.description: The value of \\\\\\\"slug-url\\\\\\\" field returned in .../brands/v2/list endpoint. Ex : aerin

optional_parameters.name: root_category
optional_parameters.description: The value of \\\\\\\"slug-url\\\\\\\" field returned in .../categories/v2/list. Ex : makeup

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: One of the following and need to be pair with country parameter properly: en-HK|zh-HK|en-AU|en-BN|id-ID|en-ID|en-MY|en-NZ|en-PH|en-SG|en-TW|zh-TW|th-TH|en-TH

optional_parameters.name: filter_type
optional_parameters.description: Filter products by types, the format is {id of filter-type}_{id of filter-value} returned in  .../products/v2/get-filters endpoint. Separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : 41_684,41_686,38_714,38_504

api_list.name: categories/v2/list
api_list.description: List categories

optional_parameters.description: One of the following : HK|AU|BN|ID|MY|NZ|PH|SG|TW|TH

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The page index for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: One of the following and need to be pair with country parameter properly: en-HK|zh-HK|en-AU|en-BN|id-ID|en-ID|en-MY|en-NZ|en-PH|en-SG|en-TW|zh-TW|th-TH|en-TH

api_list.name: categories/list-root (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List top root categories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sephora.p.rapidapi.com/categories/list-root"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sephora.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: categories/v2/list-root
api_list.description: List top root categories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sephora.p.rapidapi.com/categories/v2/list-root"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sephora.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: products/v2/get-filters
api_list.description: Generate the filter panel dynamically

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The value of \\\"id\\\" field returned in .../categories/v2/list endpoint. Separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : 801,805

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : HK|AU|BN|ID|MY|NZ|PH|SG|TW|TH

optional_parameters.name: brand
optional_parameters.description: The value of \\\\\\\"id\\\\\\\" field returned in .../brands/v2/list. Separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : 266,2636

optional_parameters.name: others
optional_parameters.description: Support only value : on_sale

optional_parameters.name: max_price
optional_parameters.description: Filter products by price

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search product by term. Ex : bikini top

optional_parameters.name: product_group
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : new-arrivals|bestsellers

optional_parameters.name: min_price
optional_parameters.description: Filter products by price

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: One of the following and need to be pair with country parameter properly: en-HK|zh-HK|en-AU|en-BN|id-ID|en-ID|en-MY|en-NZ|en-PH|en-SG|en-TW|zh-TW|th-TH|en-TH

optional_parameters.name: filter_type
optional_parameters.description: Filter products by types, the format is {id of filter-type}_{id of filter-value} returned in  .../products/v2/get-filters endpoint. Separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : 41_684,41_686,38_714,38_504

optional_parameters.name: root_brand
optional_parameters.description: Either root_brand or root_category is required. The value of \"slug-url\" field returned in .../brands/v2/list endpoint. Ex : aerin

optional_parameters.name: root_category
optional_parameters.description: Either root_brand or root_category is required. The value of \"slug-url\" field returned in .../categories/v2/list. Ex : makeup
